content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you schedule an appointment for your HVAC needs. May I have your name to get started?
Thank you, Tom. Can you please provide the address where you'll need HVAC service?
Thanks! Can you briefly describe the HVAC issue you're experiencing?
The AC isn't cooling at all and it's making some weird noise.
Got it. Thank you for letting me know. When would you ideally like us to come by for a service appointment?
Actually, I can't book yet. I'm still waiting for my insurance to confirm if they'll cover it. I'll have to schedule later.
No problem at all, Tom. If you need a quote for insurance or want to schedule the appointment later, feel free to reach out any time. We’re here to help whenever you’re ready!
reason: Customer waiting for insurance approval before scheduling.
